title: About Me
description: I am Valerio and I am a Software Engineer. For the last 6+ years I have been living in Zurich where working for companies of different sizes from big corporates to startups.
description2: I strive for high quality architecture, design and agile processes. I bring a lot of experience in products with particular attention to frontend and UX. I have a lot of energy and a strong educational background which makes me adapt quickly to new challenges and technologies.
description3: In my freetime I love to do mountain sports like skiing, climbing and hiking. Other thing I love are eating and cooking, guess it's DNA, traveling and photography. I wish to travel all the world one day.
